desc:
A client complained this morning about a judgment with 2 defendants when it should only be one.

Please confirm that on case 802/2010 for Pinetown M that:

1.	There is only one defendant which should be Samantha Owen, 7309070190085.
2.	If a David da Silva, 6201015173089, is still an active defendant on this case, he needs to be removed immediately please.

The attorney has threatened legal action against us so please can this log be expedited and dealt with immediately.
name: CW - CCW230 - URGENT! - Confirmation on case 802/2010 Pinetown M
